items.name: Axios
items.description: A promise-based HTTP client for making asynchronous requests in browsers and Node.js.

items.name: Chart.js
items.description: A simple and flexible library for creating responsive and animated charts.

items.name: D3.js
items.description: A powerful library for creating dynamic and interactive data visualizations.

items.name: Effector
items.description: A state management library focused on functional reactive programming (FRP).

items.name: Greensock
items.description: A high-performance animation library for creating smooth and complex animations.

items.name: Highcharts
items.description: A feature-rich library for creating interactive and customizable charts.

items.name: p5.js
items.description: A JavaScript library for creative coding and visual arts.

items.name: Ramda
items.description: A functional programming library providing utility functions for immutable data manipulation.

items.name: stdlib
items.description: A comprehensive standard library for numerical and scientific computing in JavaScript.

items.name: Stylis
items.description: A fast CSS preprocessor with support for nesting, variables, and custom functions.

items.name: Three.js
items.description: A cross-browser library for creating 3D graphics in the browser using WebGL.

items.name: UnJS
items.description: A collection of utilities and libraries for building modern web applications.

items.name: Immer
items.description: A library for producing immutable updates to state using "mutating" syntax.

items.name: Immutable.js
items.description: A library for working with immutable collections and data structures in JavaScript.

items.name: Microcosm
items.description: A state management library for creating composable and predictable application states.

items.name: MobX
items.description: A simple and scalable state management library with reactive data binding.

items.name: Redux
items.description: A predictable state container for JavaScript applications with a time-travel debugger.

items.name: Fluxxor
items.description: Tools for implementing the Flux architecture in JavaScript applications.

items.name: Zustand
items.description: A small, fast and scalable bearbones state-management solution using simplified flux principles. Has a comfy API based on hooks, isn't boilerplatey or opinionated.

items.name: Recoil
items.description: A state management library for React applications

items.name: Knex.js
items.description: A SQL query builder that supports multiple databases and transactions.

items.name: Leaflet
items.description: A lightweight library for creating interactive maps with markers, popups, and tile layers.

items.name: OpenLayers
items.description: A high-performance library for rendering vector and raster maps with advanced features.

items.name: Lexical
items.description: A framework for building rich text editors with a focus on extensibility and performance.

items.name: Cypress
items.description: With Cypress, you can easily create tests for your modern web applications, debug them visually, and automatically run them in your continuous integration builds.

items.name: Jest
items.description: Jest is a delightful JavaScript Testing Framework with a focus on simplicity.

items.name: Mocha
items.description: Mocha is a feature-rich JavaScript test framework running on Node.js and in the browser, making asynchronous testing simple and fun. Mocha tests run serially, allowing for flexible and accurate reporting, while mapping uncaught exceptions to the correct test cases.

items.name: Playwright
items.description: Playwright Test was created specifically to accommodate the needs of end-to-end testing. Playwright supports all modern rendering engines including Chromium, WebKit, and Firefox. Test on Windows, Linux, and macOS, locally or on CI, headless or headed with native mobile emulation of Google Chrome for Android and Mobile Safari.

items.name: Vitest
items.description: ViteTest is a fast and lightweight testing framework designed to work seamlessly with Vite projects.
